Cloud Vision V1 API - Class Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::AnnotateImageRequest (v1.16.0)

Reference documentation and code samples for the Cloud Vision V1 API class Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::AnnotateImageRequest.

Request for performing Google Cloud Vision API tasks over a user-provided image, with user-requested features, and with context information.

  • Object

Extended By

  • Google::Protobuf::MessageExts::ClassMethods
